meta.title: PageMiner - Intelligent Web Data Extraction Assistant
meta.description: PageMiner is a powerful browser extension that helps users quickly and accurately extract structured data from any webpage through visual operations. Supports multiple export formats, making data collection simple and efficient.
meta.keywords: web data extraction,data collection,web scraping,browser extension,data mining,automation tools

og.title: PageMiner - Intelligent Web Data Extraction Assistant
og.description: Quickly extract web data through visual operations, supporting multiple export formats, making data collection simple and efficient.

twitter.title: PageMiner - Intelligent Web Data Extraction Assistant
twitter.description: Quickly extract web data through visual operations, supporting multiple export formats, making data collection simple and efficient.

hero.title: Intelligent Web Data Extraction Assistant
hero.subtitle: Easily extract structured data from any web page through visual operations. No programming knowledge required, making data collection simple and efficient.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: PageMiner provides a complete web data extraction solution

visual.title: Visual Selection
visual.description: Directly select data elements on webpages through mouse hover and click operations

smart.title: Smart Rule Generation
smart.description: Automatically analyze page structure and generate precise CSS selectors without manual coding

auto.title: Auto Execution
auto.description: Automatically execute data extraction on similar pages after configuration, greatly improving work efficiency

export.title: Multiple Export Formats
export.description: Support CSV, Excel, JSON and other formats, data can be directly used in analysis tools

storage.title: Local Storage
storage.description: All data is saved locally by default, protecting your privacy and data security, supporting rule import and export

sync.title: Cloud Sync
sync.description: Support cloud synchronization of rules and data, seamless collaboration across multiple devices

howItWorks.title: How to Use
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple three steps to start intelligent data extraction

step1.title: Select Elements
step1.description: Click to select data elements on the webpage that need to be extracted

step2.title: Configure Rules
step2.description: The system automatically generates extraction rules, which you can adjust as needed

step3.title: Extract Data
step3.description: One-click execution, automatically extract and export structured data

screenshots.subtitle: Intuitive and user-friendly interface that makes data extraction simple

main.description: Clear functional layout, one-click data extraction startup

extraction.title: Data Extraction Process
extraction.description: Visual element selection with real-time extraction result preview

auto.title: Automatic Extraction
auto.description: Rule-based automatic data extraction without repetitive operations

rules.title: Rule Management
rules.description: Centralized management of all extraction rules with edit and delete support

data.title: Data Viewing
data.description: Table format display of extracted data with multiple export formats

useCases.title: Use Cases
useCases.subtitle: Tailored for different industries, making data collection simple and efficient

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Sellers
ecommerce.description: Quickly collect competitor titles, prices, sales, reviews and images, batch export for competitor analysis and product selection.
ecommerce.applicable: Applicable: Price monitoring, competitor analysis, product research

hr.title: Recruitment/Networking
hr.description: Bulk collect LinkedIn/recruitment site info, extract candidate names, positions, companies, contact details, automatically organize into structured tables
hr.applicable: Applicable: Recruitment info, candidate database, talent analysis

research.title: Academic/Research
research.description: Bulk obtain public materials, extract article titles, abstracts, authors, citation counts from news/academic sites, directly import structured data into analysis tools.
research.applicable: Applicable: Academic research, trend analysis, data collection

finance.title: Investment/Financial Analysis
finance.description: Collect company announcements, financial data, market news and consumption trends to facilitate rapid investment decisions.
finance.applicable: Applicable: Stock monitoring, financial news, market analysis

local.title: Local Life/Services
local.description: Collect customer info, extract property site community info, prices, contacts, gather yellow pages/review site customer contacts, quickly build customer database
local.applicable: Applicable: Real estate agents, business acquisition, local services

content.title: Content Creation/Media
content.description: Auto collect materials, scrape trending articles, titles, image materials, extract high-frequency words/opinions from comments for topic reference, bulk collect competitor account data for comparison
content.applicable: Applicable: Content planning, trend tracking, user insights

comparison.title: Traditional Way vs PageMiner
comparison.subtitle: See how PageMiner makes data collection so simple

traditional.title: Traditional Way
traditional.subtitle: Complex, time-consuming, error-prone
features: Requires programming skills and coding knowledge
Takes hours to write and debug code
Prone to errors, requires repeated debugging
High maintenance cost, needs rewriting when websites change
High learning curve, high barrier to entry

pageminer.title: PageMiner
pageminer.subtitle: Simple, fast, intelligent
features: Click to select, no programming required
3 minutes to complete setup, ready to use
Zero learning cost, accessible to everyone

testimonials.title: User Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Hear what users say about how PageMiner has changed their work

testimonial1.content: PageMiner has increased our competitive analysis efficiency by 10x! What used to take a full day of manual data collection now takes just minutes. The interface is clean and easy to use, even our non-technical team members can easily get started.

testimonial2.content: As a data analyst, I often need to collect data from various websites. PageMiner's intelligent recognition feature is very accurate, greatly reducing the workload of data cleaning. Support for multiple export formats perfectly fits our workflow.

testimonial3.content: Our company needs to regularly monitor industry trends and competitor information. PageMiner's scheduled task feature has been a great help, set it once and it runs automatically, saving a lot of manpower costs. The data accuracy rate is very high and trustworthy.

testimonial4.content: As a freelancer, I often need to collect various data for clients. PageMiner has greatly improved my work efficiency and increased client satisfaction. The interface is friendly with low learning cost, highly recommended!

testimonial5.content: Our team uses PageMiner for academic research data collection with excellent results. It supports complex webpage structures with high data extraction accuracy. Customer service responds promptly and quickly resolves any issues.

testimonial6.content: PageMiner's batch processing feature is very powerful, allowing simultaneous processing of data extraction tasks from multiple websites. The cloud sync feature makes our team collaboration more efficient, highly recommended for users who need team collaboration.

cta.text: Are you also using PageMiner? Share your experience

footer.description: Intelligent web data extraction assistant, making data collection simple and efficient.

meta.title: PageMiner Feature Demo - Experience Intelligent Data Extraction
meta.description: Experience PageMiner's powerful features including visual data extraction, intelligent rule generation, automated execution and more.
meta.keywords: PageMiner demo,data extraction demo,smart rule generation,visual selection,automated execution

og.title: PageMiner Feature Demo
og.description: Experience PageMiner's powerful features including visual data extraction, intelligent rule generation, automated execution and more.

demo.title: 🚀 PageMiner Feature Demo
demo.subtitle: Experience the powerful features of intelligent web data extraction and learn how to easily achieve data automation collection

coreFeatures.title: Core Feature Demo
coreFeatures.subtitle: Learn how PageMiner changes your data collection workflow

visual.title: Visual Selection
visual.description: Directly select data elements on webpages through mouse hover and click operations. The system automatically highlights selectable elements and generates unique CSS selectors.

smart.title: Smart Rule Generation
smart.description: No need to manually write CSS selectors, PageMiner automatically analyzes page structure and generates precise extraction rules, supporting text, images, links and other data types.

auto.title: Auto Execution
auto.description: After configuration, the system automatically executes data extraction on similar pages without repeated operations, greatly improving work efficiency.

data.title: Data Management
data.description: Extracted data is displayed in structured form, supporting multiple format exports for convenient subsequent analysis and processing.

form.title: Simulate Data Extraction
form.subtitle: Choose the data type to extract and experience PageMiner's intelligent extraction features

showcase.title: Feature Showcase
showcase.subtitle: Deeply understand PageMiner's technical advantages and usage methods

recognition.title: Smart Element Recognition
recognition.description: PageMiner can intelligently recognize list structures, table data, repeated elements and more in pages, automatically generating optimal extraction strategies. Supports multiple element type detection.

configuration.title: Rule Configuration
configuration.description: Supports multiple selector types including CSS selectors, XPath, DOM paths, etc., meeting different scenario needs. Automatically generates unique selectors.

reuse.title: Rule Reuse
reuse.description: Configure once, use everywhere. Supports rule import and export for more efficient team collaboration.

export.title: Data Export
export.description: Supports CSV, Excel, JSON and other format exports, data can be directly used in analysis tools or databases.

pluginFeatures.title: Plugin Feature Showcase
pluginFeatures.subtitle: Core feature display based on actual code implementation

visualMode.title: Visual Extraction Mode
visualMode.description: After starting extraction mode, hovering over page elements shows red border highlighting, clicking elements to select and configure extraction rules.

typeDetection.title: Smart Type Detection
typeDetection.description: Automatically detect element types, intelligently recommend field types, supporting text, images, links and other data types.

progress.title: Real-time Extraction Progress
progress.description: Shows real-time progress during extraction, highlighting elements being extracted, providing visual feedback and status indication.

storage.title: Local Data Storage
storage.description: All extraction rules and data are saved locally by default, protecting user privacy, supporting rule import and export.

video.title: Video Demo
video.subtitle: Learn about PageMiner's core features through video demonstration

meta.title: PageMiner Demo Video - Watch Intelligent Data Extraction Demo
meta.description: Watch the complete operation demo of PageMiner to understand the powerful features and usage methods of intelligent web data extraction.
meta.keywords: PageMiner demo video,data extraction demo,smart rule generation,visual selection,automated execution

og.title: PageMiner Demo Video
og.description: Watch the complete operation demo of PageMiner to understand the powerful features and usage methods of intelligent web data extraction.

demo.title: Feature Demo Video
demo.subtitle: Learn about PageMiner's complete workflow through actual operation demonstrations

visual.title: Visual Selection
visual.description: Demonstrates how to select page elements through mouse hover and click operations, with the system automatically highlighting selectable elements.

smart.title: Smart Rule Generation
smart.description: Shows how the system automatically analyzes page structure to generate precise CSS selectors and extraction rules.

execution.title: Data Extraction Execution
execution.description: Demonstrates how to automatically execute data extraction after configuration, showing real-time progress and results.

management.title: Result Management
management.description: Shows structured display of extracted data, export functionality, and local storage management.

overview.description: We recommend following along with the function.html page while watching the video for the best learning experience.
